entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 08:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 7 except 12 inland.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 7 except 12 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016
